title: These Leather Clutches Will Make You Rethink Your Handbag Game
description: Let these replace your everyday carry.
excerpt: From running errands to running to events, leather clutches are a surprising silhouette of the season. Shop our top picks to use for every occasion, now.

html:
Best Luxury Clutch

Bottega Veneta Long Andiamo Leather Clutch

The Bottega Veneta Andiamo style has become synonymous with excellent taste, so it’s only natural that the Andiamo clutch silhouette is the perfectly elevated solution to holding only the essentials.

Dimensions: Height: 5.1 inches; width: 12.2 inches; depth: 1.2 inches

Colors: 7 options

Materials: Lambskin

Best Suede Clutch

Savette Slim Symmetry Pochette in Wine Suede

For a clutch with a bit more space but still keeping that east-west, minimalist-chic feel, try Savette’s suede Pochette. This style can hold more than a wallet-clutch but still look structured and sleek.

Dimensions: Height: 4.5 inches; width: 11 inches; depth: 3 inches

Colors: Wine suede

Materials: 100% Calfskin

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Pop of Red

The Row Mel Clutch in Leather

Add a pop of red with The Row’s vibrant and perfectly-curved clutch. With a hidden zipper-top closure, this pouch can hold your cards, keys, glosses, and more—but not too much more! We’re going for minimalism, after all.

Dimensions: Height: 5.5 inches; width: 10.5 inches; depth: 2 inches

Colors: Ruby, Black

Materials: 100% Kidskin leather

Best Jewelry on a Bag

Alexis Bittar Gold Ribbon Convertible Shoulder Bag

You may know Alexis Bittar for his statement jewelry (and even bigger statements on the brand’s viral Instagram “reality” show), but don’t sleep on the bags. Simple silhouettes are met with sculptural embellishments (to match your jewelry, of course) and are made perfectly for any occasion. Clutches also come with an optional gold chain to turn into a sleek crossbody.

Dimensions: Height: 5.5 inches; width: 11.75 inches; depth: 2 inches

Colors: Chocolate, Black, Rouge

Materials: Suede and leather

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Snakeskin Clutch

Khaite The Aimee Python-Effect Clutch Bag

Khaite’s snake-embossed leather clutch is the perfect edgy addition to any outfit, whether daytime or nighttime, casual or formal. Structured yet slouchy and spacious (and yet simple), this clutch (and anything from Khaite, really) is never a bad idea.

Dimensions: Height: 5.98 inches; width: 12 inches; depth: 5 inches

Materials: 100% Calf leather

Best Ironic Clutch

Jacquemus La Pochette Rond Clutch Bag

Consider what it might look like to carry a brown paper lunch bag, but up close it’s a luxury handbag from Jacquemus. Cheeky irony is nothing new to the French brand. However, if you want a more handbag-look, this style also comes in cream and shearling.

Dimensions

: Width 10.9 inches; Height 6.69 inches; Depth 4.8 inches

Colors: Beige, Ivory, Off-White Shearling

Materials: 100% Goatskin leather

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Medium-Scale Clutch

DeMellier The Miami Clutch

DeMellier’s Miami handbag is a wonderful medium-scale clutch with the option to be a shoulder bag. In both black and off-white with barely-there gold finishes, this clutch is elegant yet effortless.

Dimensions: Height: 6 inches; width: 8.9 inches; depth: 3.5 inches

Colors: Off-White Smooth, Suede & Black Smooth

Materials: Ethically sourced cowhide leather

Best East-West Clutch

Dries Van Noten Crisp Leather Clutch Bag

A true east-west size and scale, this Dries van Noten clutch in patent leather is a baguette bag lover’s dream.

Dimensions: Height: 5.9 inches; width: 16.1 inches; Height 5.9 inches; depth: 3.9 inches

Materials: Calf leather

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Affordable Leather Clutch

Banana Republic Riviera Leather Clutch

Banana Republic’s Riviera clutch, which comes in both red and black, is a chic pleated take on the pouch bag. It can be perfectly nestled under your arm or pinched at its magnetic closure.

Dimensions: Height: 6.3 inches; width: 12.8 inches; depth: 2.75 inches

Colors: Ultra Red, Black

Materials: 100% Leather

Customer review: “Lovely clutch. It's roomy, beautiful and unique. I got many compliments. Great price.”

Best Textured Clutch

Co Small Leather Clutch in Espresso

Reptilian patterns, skins, and embossments are going to be everywhere in 2025. With this micro-embossed leather clutch from Co, you can get in on the trend in a smooth, subtle way.

Dimensions: Height: 6.5 inches; width: 10.2 inches; depth: 3.1 inches

Colors: Espresso, Black, Ivory, Olive, Burgundy

Materials: 100% Leather

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Minimalist Design

Saint Laurent Midnight Small Clutch

Can it get any sleeker than a Saint Laurent lacquered leather rectangular clutch? The answer is always no. Pro tip: Get a manicure to match!

Dimensions: Height: 3.9 inches; width: 10.2 inches; depth: 1.6 inches

Colors: Dark Red Wine, Griotte

Materials: Calfskin

Best Oversized Clutch

Cos Pochette Cavatelli

A clutch doesn’t have to be teeny tiny. This pouch clutch from Cos will hold everything you need and give you that perfectly bundled bag look. If your arms get tired, it also comes with an optional leather strap.

Dimensions: Height: 12.59 inches; width: 16.53 inches; depth: 3.14 inches

Colors: Bordeaux, Black, Chestnut, Red

Materials: 100% Leather

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Why Trust ELLE

Every product featured on ELLE.com is independently researched, tested, or editor-approved. We only recommend products that we stand behind, and the merchandise featured on our site is always driven by editorial and product testing standards, not by affiliate deals or advertising relationships. Any content created in partnership with advertisers is marked as such.
